analysis.description:
LordCoinPreICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#284-296) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- LC.balanceOf(_sender) == 0
	- LC.balanceOf(this) == 0

LordCoinPreICO.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#278-284) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-LC.transfer(beneficiary,LC.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#280-282)

LordCoinPreICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#284-296) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-LC.transfer(_sender,lcCount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol)

Reentrancy in LordCoinPreICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#284-296):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(LC.balanceOf(this) >= lcCount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#293-294)
	- LC.balanceOf(_sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol)

Reentrancy in LordCoinPreICO.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#284-296):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(LC.balanceOf(this) >= lcCount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#293-294)
	- LC.balanceOf(_sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol)
	- LC.transfer(_sender,lcCount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol)

Reentrancy in LordCoinPreICO.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#278-284):
	External calls:
	- LC.transfer(beneficiary,LC.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#280-282)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/11/0x9a134ce4bbd8c7b3a262774fafd60b7f7ce3655b.sol#282)
